import React from 'react' import { Radio } from 'antd' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux' //action import { fetchFilms } from '../store/action' const Sort = (props) =>
const mapStateToProps = state => ({ page: state.tasks.page, sort_field: state.tasks.sort_field, sort_direction: state.tasks.sort_direction, }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ fetchFilms: bindActionCreators(fetchFilms, dispatch), }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Sort) const Field = ({ page, sort_field, sort_direction, fetchFilms }) => fetchFilms(page, e.target.value, sort_direction)}> _id name release format const Direction = ({ page, sort_field, sort_direction, fetchFilms }) => fetchTasks(page, sort_field, e.target.value)}> asc desc
